body: Like many scavengers, you can stomach foods that would make weaker creatures ill.
name: Carrion Feeder
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Tengus/New Racial Rules/Tengu Feats/Carrion Feeder

sections.body: You gain a +2 racial bonus on saving throws against diseases and ingested poisons (but not other poisons). You receive a +2 bonus on Survival skill checks to find food for yourself (and only yourself).
sections.name: Benefit
